title: Excellent Women
description: Explore the lives of extraordinary women who embody the essence of excellence according to Christian values in 'Excellent Women'. Delve into the biographies of Elizabeth Fry, Frances Ridley Havergal, Hannah More, Susanna Wesley, and Mary Louisa Whately, amongst many others. From their unwavering faith to their selfless dedication, witness their profound impact on society and their unwavering commitment to righteousness.
author: Barbara Pym
